messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Unschooling Camp in OR...from HEM
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/18/2003 3:38:53 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I was just looking for comments from anyone with experience. Thanks! ... Yes, I understand
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/18/2003 3:38:53 PM Eastern Standard Time,
CHILDLEDucator@... writes:
>Is there a web site? Somehow I missed that. Laura D>>
I was just looking
for comments from anyone with experience. Thanks!
>Peace,
>Sarah
Yes, I understand that, I was wondering what the web site was as I had never
herd of it and I was interested in seeing what an Unschooling camp was all
about. I apologize for piggy backing on your question...... I know it now, I
looked it up...........nevermind.,

Laura D

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Camp in OR...from HEM
messages.msgSnippet:

website is www.nbtsc.org.  We are looking into doing the September 4 -11 in
messages.messageBody:
>Is there a web site? Somehow I missed that. Laura D
><<<<<<Has anyone sent their children to the unschooling camp advertised in
HEM? My girls have expressed an interest in attending. I was >just looking
for comments from anyone with experience. Thanks!
>Peace,
>Sarah


Laura,
The camp is advertised on page 46 of the July/August issue of HEM. The
website is www.nbtsc.org. We are looking into doing the September 4 -11 in
OR this year.
Peace,
Sarah
